column1: Mayor, the geologist is here to see you.
No mayor, that's a gynecologist. A geologist studies the earth.
I'm not in your office mayor, I'm talking to you through a speaker.
Thank you mayor, it's been great working for you.
Mayor, the-ee South Park Elementary children are discussing the flag issue in their debate club on Friday.
Uhhh, we'll just leave you to your cleanup.
Yes sir!  The goat seems to be clean, sir!
Placing the blood spatter now, sir.
